DOC.brief_summary: Water consumption essential maintain hydration good health . Sodium-bicarbonated mineral water report beneficial digestive hypocholesterolemic property . The aim study investigate effect consumption sodium-bicarbonated mineral water ( BW ) without meal , compare low mineral content water control water ( CW ) , postprandial serum triacylglycerols ( TAG ) , cholecystokinin ( CCK ) , gallbladder volume .
DOC.criteria: Adult ( > 18 < 40 year ) BMI > 18 < 30 kg/m2 Age < 18 > 40 year TAG > 250 mg/dL ( 2.82 mmol/L ) Being usual consumer carbonic mineral water Obesity Diabetes Hypertension digestive , liver renal disease Biliary obstruction Eating disorder Being medication could affect lipid metabolism Consumption functional food could affect lipid metabolism ( food contain n3 fatty acid phytosterols )
